item.title: GitHub Codespaces Gotchas with ASP.NET Core OAuth
item.description: This week GitHub Codespaces was made generally available for Teams and Enterprise, and coupled with the release of the ability to open any repository in Visual Studio Code in a web browser just by pressing ., I thought I’d give it a try with some existing projects. In the process I hit a few gotchas that took me a few hours to get to the bottom of. This post goes through some of those and how to resolve them.
